attributes.action: Ban All seller to sell online if they do not honor their sale
attributes.additional_details:
I am pretty sure we all have experienced a growing number of online seller's/ retailers refuse to honor their sales.
Argos, Amazon, NewLook, etc etc all these retail groups including people privately selling on eBay and Amazon are refusing to complete transaction simply saying its mentioned in our terms and conditions.
Enough is enough if you can't honor sales then don't sell them online.
This behavior has caused us all a lot of pain. let all vote. So Government make a law to stop any company to make online sales if they refuse a specific number of orders placed online over a certain period of time.
5% over a 1 year.
